library.name: java.j2se
library.description: APIs in Java Standard Edition (Java SE)

field.name: CANADA
field.alias: CANADA_FRENCH, CHINA, CHINESE, ENGLISH, FRANCE, FRENCH, GERMAN, GERMANY, ITALIAN, ITALY, JAPAN, JAPANESE, KOREA, KOREAN, PRC, ROOT, SIMPLIFIED_CHINESE, TAIWAN, TRADITIONAL_CHINESE, UK, US

class.name: java.text.Normalizer
class.description: Transforms Unicode text into an equivalent composed or decomposed form

class.name: java.io.ObjectOutputStream
class.supertypes: java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, java.io.ObjectOutput, java.io.ObjectStreamConstants, java.lang.AutoCloseable

method.name: read
method.signature: read(java.nio.ByteBuffer[], int, int, long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit, java.lang.Object, java.nio.channels.CompletionHandler)

method.name: write
method.signature: write(java.nio.ByteBuffer[], int, int, long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit, java.lang.Object, java.nio.channels.CompletionHandler)

method.name: clear
method.description: This does not erase data, but it acts as it

method.name: get
method.alias: getAcquire, getAndAdd, getAndAddAcquire, getAndAddRelease, getAndBitwiseAnd, getAndBitwiseAndAcquire, getAndBitwiseAndRelease, getAndBitwiseOr, getAndBitwiseOrAcquire, getAndBitwiseOrRelease, getAndBitwiseXor, getAndBitwiseXorAcquire, getAndBitwiseXorRelease, getAndSet, getAndSetAcquire, getAndSetRelease, getOpaque, getVolatile
